name: Trio Multiplayer
description:
PRO Multiplayer version for up to four players!

You are two friends, you are bored, you have a Smartphone? Great!
You are more than two players? No problem - with the Pro version you can play trio with two, three or four players.

Who thinks faster? Who has the better reactions?

An ingenious game idea and a really fancy design ensure maximum fun!
Decide as fast as possible, whether the three symbols in front of you make a trio or not. Be faster than your opponent - but watch out, because mistakes will not be forgiven.
You can decide how many rounds you want to play and how long each round should last.


These are the Trio rules:

The three pattern and shapes have to either be the same for each symbol or completely different to build a Trio.

The Player who finds the Trio faster gets the point. Winner is the player with more points.
